alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions with significant blowing and drifting of snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Northeast winds between 25 and 35 mph, with gusts to around 45 mph expected this morning, decreasing gradually in the afternoon. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible, especially during the morning commute. Flight delays and possibly cancellations are possible. Interstate 80 will likely be closed across eastern Sweetwater County for a prolonged period. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Only travel in emergencies.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
